Class Function

  • java.lang.Object
    • Function
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Constant, Difference, MultiProduct, MultiSum, Negation, Polynomial, Power, Product, Quotient, Sum

    abstract class Function
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class that represents a general function. Subclasses provide implementations for the value of the function, its string representation, and its derivative.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Function​()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double bisectionMethod​(double a, double b)
      Performs the bisection method for finding the root of the function according the given interval With a default accuracy of 10^-5.
      double bisectionMethod​(double a, double b, double epsilon)
      Performs the bisection method for finding the root of the function according the given interval.
      abstract Function derivative​()
      Calculates the derivative of the function.
      double newtonRaphsonMethod​(double a)
      Performs the Newton Raphson method for finding the root of the function, starting from the given initial value.
      double newtonRaphsonMethod​(double a, double epsilon)
      Performs the Newton Raphson method for finding the root of the function, starting from the given initial value.
      Function taylorPolynomial​(int n)
      Calculates the Taylor polynomial of the function according to the specified degree.
      abstract java.lang.String toString​()
      Returns the string representation of the function.
      abstract double valueAt​(double x)
      Calculates the value of the function at a given value.

      • bisectionMethod

        public double bisectionMethod​(double a,
                              double b)
        Performs the bisection method for finding the root of the function according the given interval With a default accuracy of 10^-5.
        Parameters:
        a - the left endpoint.\
        b - the right endpoint
        Returns:
        The root of the function given the specified interval

      • newtonRaphsonMethod

        public double newtonRaphsonMethod​(double a)
        Performs the Newton Raphson method for finding the root of the function, starting from the given initial value. With a default accuracy of 10^-5.
        Parameters:
        a - The initial value
        Returns:
        The root of the function
